traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mounted Combatant
traits.desc: The bullywug typically fights from the back of a tortoise. The tortoise and the bullywug share an initiative in combat. If the bullywug is hit for 10 points of damage or more from a single attack, it must succeed on an athletics check with DC equal to the damage of the attack or fall from its mount.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.desc: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Lance
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage. If the bullywug is not riding a tortoise, this attack is made with disadvantage.
